name: Tahoe Hydro OG
description: Tahoe Hydro OG by Tahoe Hydroponic Company, which won the 2016 Jack Herer Cup for Best Indica Flower, is a rich cross of Tahoe OG and OG #18. This strain has a distinct aroma of lemon and fuel with complex earthy notes on the exhale. It is ideal after-hours, saddling the consumer with heavy limbs and deep relaxation. A potent indica, Tahoe Hydro OG works wonders on chronic pain, nausea, and restlessness.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Tingly, Creative, Euphoric, Happy, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Stress, Depression, Eye Pressure, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Headache
